availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy J. Brey Lively. Father of George W. Lively, William H. Lively, Martha Lively, Jefferson D. Lively, and Leona B. Lively. Farmer in Green County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 591.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckenridge County, McDaniels District, p. 137B.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 8325.
